newsitem.title: MALAYSIA: MALAYSIA STOCKS - factors to watch - March 3.
newsitem.headline: MALAYSIA STOCKS - factors to watch - March 3.

text.p: Following are some of the main factors likely to affect Malaysian stocks on Monday:
* On Friday the U.S. Dow Jones Industrial Average fell for the third consecutive session. The index was down 47.33 to 6,877.74.
* The Kuala Lumpur Composite Index rose 11.23 to 1,270.67 helped by a 19 percent improvement in Telekom Malaysia's 1996 earnings.
* Malaysia's broad money supply M3, expanded by 22.1 percent year-on-year in January against 22.7 percent in December.
* Malaysian conglomerate Sime Darby bought a 50.6 percent stake in Thailand's Morakot Industries PLC for 76 million ringgit.
